Netlify Serverless Functions Example

This is a simple example of how we can add serverless functions to our Node.js applications.

Examples

  • Home {' '} (/.netlify/functions/api )
  • Users {' '} (/.netlify/functions/api/users )
  • User {' '} (/.netlify/functions/api/users/3 )

With redirects

  • Home {' '} ( /api )
  • Users {' '} (/api/users )
  • User {' '} (/api/users/3 )
); } export default App;
